description:
In a world where the Demon King has died, a host of demigods capable of felling him have inherited the world: a master fencer who can figure out how to take out their opponent with a single glance; a lancer so swift they can break the sound barrier; a wyvern rogue who fights with three legendary weapons at once; an all-powerful wizard who can speak thoughts into being; and an angelic assassin who deals instant death. Eager to attain the title of “One True Hero,” these champions each pursue challenges against formidable foes and spark conflicts themselves. The battle to determine the mightiest of the mighty begins.

(Source: Yen Press)

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Class Struggle
tags.description: Contains conflict born between the different social classes. Generally between an dominant elite and a suffering oppressed group.

tags.name: Desert
tags.description: Prominently features a desert environment.

tags.name: Dystopian
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

tags.name: Skeleton
tags.description: Prominently features skeleton(s) as a character.

tags.name: Robots
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid machines.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Espionage
tags.description: Prominently features characters infiltrating an organization in order to steal sensitive information.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

alternative: Yanagi no Ken no Soujirou (柳の剣のソウジロウ)
Tooi Kagizume no Yuno (遠い鉤爪のユノ)
Seijakunaru Harghent (静寂なるハルゲント)
Rankai Ryoureki Nihilo (濫回凌轢ニヒロ)
Imashime no Taren (警めのタレン)
Akai Shisen no Elea (赤い紙箋のエレア)
Sekai Shi no Kia (世界詞のキア)
Seiten no Curte (晴天のカーテ)
Sekki no Tsubasa Regnejee (夕暉の翼レグネジィ)
Hayaki Sumi Jelki (速き墨ジェルキ)
Toori-ka no Kuze (通り禍のクゼ)
Shizukani Utau Nastique (静かに歌うナスティーク)
Kouunrou no Yuca (光暈牢のユカ)

node.description: Originally an animator. Often works with [Hijiri Sanpei](https://anilist.co/staff/149565/).
Takahiro Majima is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/choco_kiku) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/菊地洋子)

Married to [Eiji Suganuma](https://anilist.co/staff/109167/).

_Note: Not to be confused with [Youko Kikuchi (菊地陽子)](https://anilist.co/staff/141535/), different kanji._

**[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kat.njima)** | **[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kat_njima)**

**Katsuhiro Nakajima** is a Japanese sound effects creator/editor working for [Swara Production](https://anidb.net/creator/3214).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/濱野高年)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule.
